describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

menarche_age.description: Age at menarche, rounded to nearest whole number.

menstrual_cycle_stage.description: Menstrual cycle stage of donor at the time of collection.
menstrual_cycle_stage.example: follicular phase; ovulation; luteal phase; menstruation
menstrual_cycle_stage.guidelines: Should be one of: follicular phase; ovulation; luteal phase; menstruation

menopause_status.description: Menopausal status of donor at time of sample collection.
menopause_status.guidelines: Should be one of: pre-menopausal; peri-menopausal; post-menopausal; post-menopausal (induced)

parity.description: Number of children (full-term pregnancies) the donor has given birth to at time of sample collection.

gravidity.description: Number of pregnancies the donor has had at time of sample collection.
